name: Mexican Vegan "Tuna" Salad
description: Fun textures abound in this salad. This salad is best served in a sandwich or on tostadas topped with avocado slices.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 - 1 tbsp. Pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas in a shallow bowl and use a fork to mash them up.
recipeInstructions.name: Place chickpeas in a shallow bowl and use a fork to mash them up.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes. onion, serrano and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatoes. onion, serrano and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan mayo and 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan mayo and 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Season and taste. If necessary add remaining 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Season and taste. If necessary add remaining 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Place salad in fridge for 15 to 20 min. (optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Place salad in fridge for 15 to 20 min. (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve on a sandwich or on tostadas.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve on a sandwich or on tostadas.

keywords: chickpea tuna salad, vegan tuna salad
